name: ccfenics
description: FEniCSx/DOLFINx finite element computing â€” 38 MCP tools for mesh generation, function spaces, variational forms, solvers, and post-processing
long_description: MCP server for scientific computing with the FEniCSx/DOLFINx finite element framework. Solve Poisson, elasticity, Stokes, Navier-Stokes, Helmholtz, eigenvalue problems and more. Runs inside a Docker container with the full DOLFINx/PETSc/SLEPc stack.
